output_list.reason: The mint function does not check for overflow, allowing the token amount to be set to a very high value, leading to a denial of service to other users.
The mint function allows any user to set the balance of any address, including their own, leading to the loss of funds.
The transferFrom function does not check for overflow, allowing the token amount to be set to a very high value, leading to a denial of service to other users.
The transferFrom function allows any user to set the balance of any address, including their own, leading to the loss of funds.
The constructor function is misspelled as 'CTest7', which is not a valid constructor function and will revert all Ether sent to it.
